TopicTitle: The Alarm Clock app is infuriating...

Articles.Content: Every time I set an alarm the clock freezes or stales and when I jump to the ship I takes me to a random vessel, I just missed my Pol flyby due of this and it happens all the time, when I'm done screaming in blind rage Il read the comments.

On 6/30/2021 at 12:39 PM, Minmus Taster said:

Every time I set an alarm the clock freezes or stales and when I jump to the ship I takes me to a random vessel, I just missed my Pol flyby due of this and it happens all the time, when I'm done screaming in blind rage Il read the comments.

It is buggy, they are working on fixes
